title: MEDICINE.MAN.1992.PAL.DVDR.MULTISUBS[9] -Lindoff
description:
Description
An eccentric scientist working for a large drug company is working on a 
research project in the Amazon jungle. He sends for a research assistant 
and a gas chromatograph because he's close to a cure for cancer. When 
the assistant turns out to be a "mere woman," he rejects her help. Meanwhile 
the bulldozers get closer to the area in which they are conducting research, 
and they eventually learn to work together, and begin falling in love.
